Here at The Pennington Apartment Homes located in Downtown Tacoma, we offer secured access to the building.
We are conveniently located by Pantages Theater, Coffee Shops, University of Washington, 6th Ave restaurants, shopping, Foss Waterway, Ruston Way, shopping and easy access to the freeways.
Pennington is multifamily apartment complex that was constructed in 1931.Classic Brick Building with Old World Charm!
The Pennington has studio and one bedroom apartments in Tacoma with views of downtown and Mt. Rainier.
We're on the bus line and within walking distance to Tacoma General, Mary Bridge Hospital and Historic Wright Park.
